item.description:
Here are some of the details about Chowder Fest.....

When: Saturday, June 2nd
Where: Newport Yacht Club / Newport, RI
How Much: $15 advance, $20 after May 18th. (link below for
advance purchase)
http://www.newportfes...

What:
Chowder competitors from around the nation are making their
plans for the 2007 Cook-Off. Recipes are being tested and
perfected. The Newport Yachting Center is the place to be on
June 2 nd as top chefs throw down the oven mitts and get it
on. Who'll be the Best? You be the judge.

Entertainment will be aplenty as well, with sounds from 3-
Legged Dog (a 70s-90s cover band), Pat Cottrell (sounds like
James Taylor meets Jimmy Buffett), Diane Blue (local funk-blues-
jazz great), and more!

Amanda O is the contact.
item.name: Newport Chower Cook- Off
